st:Description.name: ElectricalModeler
st:Description.st:role: Define electrical wire routing - General settings
st:Description.st:detailedRole: Define electrical wire routing - General settings

st:attribute.Name: CheckCreationMode
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Branchable Bend Radius to be computed based on bend radius ratio and max. diameter of segment after wire routing

st:enum.st:role: Do not take bend radius ratio into account
Take bend radius ratio into account

st:default.st:role: By default do not take BRR into account

st:attribute.Name: ComputeFromWire
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Bundle segments diameter and bend radius will be computed from its contents, i.e. wires, wire groups

st:enum.st:role: Do not take Wire into account

st:default.st:role: By default take Wire into account

st:attribute.Name: ComputeBNSDiaMode
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: If checked, bundle segments diameter will be computed using equivalent area method

st:enum.st:role: Do not use equivalent area method to compute bundle segment diameter
Use equivalent area method to compute bundle segment diameter

st:default.st:role: By default do not use equivalent area method to compute bundle segment diameter

st:attribute.Name: BNSEquipotentialDiaFactor
st:attribute.st:role: Ratio to add to equivalent area in percentage
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Setting to manage the ratio to add to equivalent area in percentage for diameter computation

st:default.st:role: By default the tolerance is set to 20 percent
